NarrPara.Content: Interface parallelism with default (empty) name sets for both sides. Notice the required extra BAR (\verb'|') after/before the parallel brackets.
Interface parallelism with explicit name sets.
Alphabetised parallelism with default (empty) name sets for both sides. Notice the required extra BAR (\verb'|') after/before the parallel brackets.
Alphabetised parallelism with explicit name sets.
